headline: Genmab to acquire closely watched cancer drug in $8B Merus buyout
summary: The deal hands Genmab a drug that showed the potential in earlier testing to extend survival in head and neck cancer when added to Merck’s widely used immunotherapy Keytruda.

headline: Merck Selects Broadridge to Transform Treasury Operations with Real-Time Account Visibility
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced that Merck has selected Broadridge to implement Swift's new Instant Cash Reporting service through its Swift Service Bureau (SSB) and SCORE+ services. The comprehensive solution enables Merck to transform treasury operations with real-time, on-demand access to balance and transaction information of more than 400 accounts globally.

headline: 1 Surging  Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Avoid
summary: Exciting developments are taking place for the stocks in this article. They’ve all surged ahead of the broader market over the last month as catalysts such as new products and positive media coverage have propelled their returns.
